title: Orecchiette With Chicken Sausage And Broccoli Rabe
summary: Orecchiette With Chicken Sausage And Broccoli Rabe might be just the main course you are searching for. One serving contains 726 calories, 42g of protein, and 27g of fat. This recipe serves 3 and costs $3.36 per serving. A mixture of parmigiano reggiano, chicken sausage, chicken broth, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so delicious. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes approximately 45 minutes. It is a pretty expensive recipe for fans of Mediterranean food. 359 people were impressed by this recipe. With a spoonacular score of 93%, this dish is super. Try Orecchiette With Chicken Sausage And Broccoli Rabe, Orecchiette With Broccoli Rabe And Sausage, and Orecchiette with Sausage and Broccoli Rabe for similar recipes.

winePairing.pairingText: Italian on the menu? Try pairing with Chianti, Trebbiano, and Verdicchio. Italians know food and they know wine. Trebbiano and Verdicchio are Italian white wines that pair well with fish and white meat, while Chianti is a great Italian red for heavier, bolder dishes. You could try Castello di Meleto Chianti Classico Gran Selezione. Reviewers quite like it with a 4.4 out of 5 star rating and a price of about 57 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Castello di Meleto Chianti Classico Gran Selezione
productMatches.description: Intense ruby red. Powerful and rich with spicy and balsamic notes followed by red berry fruit aromas. Fine, elegant tannins delight the palate announcing a pleasant and long aftertaste.
